item.title: Imperial College Sailing Club travels to the Mediterranean
item.author: Nilani Chandradeva,
item.description: On the 30th of June, 12 members of the Imperial College Sailing Club met at Gatwick’s Wetherspoons before beginning the voyage to Corfu, Greece. Upon a late night arrival at the marina, they carb loaded with the infamous Greek dish, gyros, and headed into town to join their training partners from …
